overview: From 2025-08-08 to 2025-08-09, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topPRs.title: configurable delay between game responses
topPRs.author: leopoldjoy
topPRs.body:
**Description**

This PR adds a configurable parameter, `ResponseDelay`, controlling the delay between game responses. Furthermore, a secondary configurable parameter, `ResponseDelayAfter`, is also added, which defines the number of responses after which to start applying the delay.

Finally, the delay configuration is ignored (bypassed) altogether if the current time is already inside the extension period, in order to prevent accidentally waiting beyond the end of a game.

**Tests**

This PR includes a set of unit tests (see [here](https://github.com/leopoldjoy/optimism/blob/feat/configurable-delay-between-game-responses/op-challenger/game/fault/agent_test.go)) and integration tests (see [here](https://github.com/leopoldjoy/optimism/blob/feat/configurable-delay-between-game-responses/op-e2e/faultproofs/response_delay_test.go)) covering the various cases of these new config parameters.

**Additional context**

This new configurable parameter enables intentionally delaying a challenger response to a game in order to make the game progress more slowly. See the thread below for further details on the additional features and their associated motivations.

topPRs.title: dependabot(gomod): bump github.com/lmittmann/w3 from 0.19.5 to 0.20.2
topPRs.author: dependabot
topPRs.body:
Bumps [github.com/lmittmann/w3](https://github.com/lmittmann/w3) from 0.19.5 to 0.20.2.
Release notes

Sourced from github.com/lmittmann/w3's releases.

v0.20.2

What's Changed

  • w3vm: add VM.Clone by @​zacksinclair in lmittmann/w3#269

New Contributors

  • @​zacksinclair made their first contribution in lmittmann/w3#269

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lmittmann/w3/compare/v0.20.1...v0.20.2

v0.20.1

What's Changed

  • w3vm: add burntpix benchmark by @​lmittmann in lmittmann/w3#266
  • build(deps): bump github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum from 1.16.1 to 1.16.2 by @​dependabot[bot] in lmittmann/w3#270
  • w3vm: add WithJumpDestCache by @​lmittmann in lmittmann/w3#272
  • w3vm: fix potential testdata corruption during test interrupt by @​lmittmann in lmittmann/w3#274

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lmittmann/w3/compare/v0.20.0...v0.20.1

v0.20.0

Improved Tuple Parsing in w3.NewFunc et al.

Go-structs that map to a Solidity-tuple can now be used directly in the signature to parse in w3.NewFunc.

var FuncSwap = w3.MustNewFunc(
    "swap(PoolKey key, SwapParams params, bytes hookData)", "int256 delta",
    PoolKey{}, SwapParams{},
)

type PoolKey struct {
Currency0   common.Address
Currency1   common.Address
Fee         *big.Int abitype:"uint24"
TickSpacing *big.Int abitype:"int24"
Hooks       common.Addresss
}


type SwapParams struct {
ZeroForOne        bool
AmountSpecified   *big.Int abitype:"int256"
</tr></table>

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 3f242b8 w3vm: add VM.Clone (#269)
  • 230c05d w3vm: fix potential testdata corruption during test interrupt (#274)
  • 37da85b w3vm: doc fix
  • c2a29bd w3vm: add WithJumpDestCache (#272)
  • ff230fd build(deps): bump github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum from 1.16.1 to 1.16.2 (#270)
  • 7f133f9 w3vm: add burntpix benchmark (#266)
  • d666255 w3vm: reduced rate limit of test rpc client
  • 73c6c3a updated RPC provider
  • 80b37c8 w3vm: updated testClient rate limit
  • b00c363 docs: added tg batch
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

topContributors.summary: leopoldjoy: Focused on ongoing development, opening a PR in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#16988) to introduce a configurable delay between game responses, while also making code changes across 10 files (+239/-10 lines) with a primary focus on other work and tests.
